Bo'ai county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

sentences.english: Even if a person, on people, natural public life, there is love of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使一個人，對人們，自然衆生命，有博愛之心。

sentences.english: Besides, I want you to tell me why I should not go in for philanthropy.
sentences.chinese: 此外，請你告訴我幹嗎我不應沉迷於博愛主義。

sentences.english: Whereas equality militates against distinction and authority, fraternity does not do this.
sentences.chinese: 儘管平等對高貴和權威產生不利影響，但博愛不會。

sentences.english: You will have a childlike approach this week, big hearted and full of spunk.
sentences.chinese: 本週你有孩童般的心，博愛，精力充沛。

sentences.english: Only then equally bold, but universal love Ajiao Mr. also groans in the public area.
sentences.chinese: 只有一樣豪放而博愛的阿嬌君還在公共場合裏呻吟。

sentences.english: Xiangtan Humanity Hospital is China's first men's brand hospital.
sentences.chinese: 上湘潭博愛醫院是我國首家男科品牌醫院。

sentences.english: Hatred can only be ceased with love.
sentences.chinese: 仇恨只能以博愛作爲結束。

sentences.english: Caritas and other charity groups call it "energy poverty."
sentences.chinese: 博愛與其他慈善團體稱之爲“能源貧困。”

sentences.english: He was a witty  loving man.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個有智慧又博愛的人。

sentences.english: One of writer's favourite themes is the fraternity of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 作家最喜歡寫的一個主題是人類的博愛。

sentences.english: Then the upper part of Boai Lu fills with Dai merchants and shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 博愛路上半部都是大理本地商人和店主。

sentences.english: The charity of his soul still lives on among many Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 他的博愛精神仍然活在許多中國人的心中。

sentences.english: But one ought not to play political stunts in the name of Liberty, Equality and Fraternity.
sentences.chinese: 但不應該以自由，平等，博愛之名去耍政治手腕。

sentences.english: The glass bottle , from O-I, completes the limited - edition package's appeal.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃瓶，從博愛，完成了限量版的軟件包的上訴。

sentences.english: Introducing the great changes of BOat Wire Rod Plant which have taken place since 1985.
sentences.chinese: 介紹博愛線材廠1985年以來發生的巨大變化。
